Name: Flor Angela
description:
38-year-old Flor is an entrepreneurial and very hardworking woman. She is a single mother of a young 9-year-old daughter, who is her reason for continuing ahead. 11 years ago she started working in agriculture, growing and producing dry and wet cacao. She looks to keep her crop clean without plague with the goal of increasing her production and improving the quality of her harvests.

It is for this reason she is asking for her loan through Kiva to grow and prune her parcel of cacao to bring a better product to her clients so that they always recommend her.

Also, she works by growing and fattening cattle and looks to improve her home to bring a better quality of life to her little daughter.
